data.name: Don't Feed the Animals
data.detailed_description:
The Kaiser’s cakes are so good he’s going to take over the world! ...Unless you stop him! Play as a variety of animals in a “VR Angry Birds with Airplanes” game. As you fly around bombing destructible puzzles in your attempt to destroy all the cakes. If only it were that easy! You also have to avoid bombing and destroying the presents, that are sometimes precariously close to those world dominating cakes.

The initial challenge is to complete the puzzle by destroying all the cakes. You get extra points for each piece of the structure destroyed, and lose points for any presents lost. Do it all with the least number of bombs for the highest score.
The only lose condition is running out of bombs, while cakes remain intact. No worries simply crash the plane and the level resets!

Features

  • Simple Flight Controls
  • 1 Environments
  • 6 Flyable Airplanes
  • 36 Challenging Puzzles
  • High level of VR comfort
data.about_the_game:
The Kaiser’s cakes are so good he’s going to take over the world! ...Unless you stop him! Play as a variety of animals in a “VR Angry Birds with Airplanes” game. The only lose condition is running out of bombs, while cakes remain intact. No worries simply crash the plane and the level resets!

Features

data.short_description: Use your Vive with an intuitive new flight control of RC style airplanes. Drop bombs to blow up cakes in destructible puzzle structures while being careful not to blow up any presents placed throughout the level. The challenge will be to destroy the most, with the least number of bombs, for the highest score.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1x USB 2.0 or better port also required
